612520.name: Sudden Strike 2 Gold
612520.description:
At the height of World War 2, take command of German, Russian, British, American and Imperial Japanese armies on battelfields across the globe. Sudden Strike 2 expands on all aspects of the classic RTS game with new units, maps and epic campaigns.

Features


  • 5 epic campaigns and a new combat theater: The Pacific!
  • Massive battleships, landing craft and trains
  • Command airfields and deploy aircraft
  • Mechanized units now have individual crews to command
  • Dynamic weather system
  • Contains "Sudden Strike 2", "Resource War" add-on and "Total Victory" map pack
  • Contains map editor for user-generated maps and missions
612520.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语*, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
